data.title: Fitness
bullets: Before COVID: I was an avid gym goer usually at least 1-2 hours everyday, usually lifting weights and doing cardio
During COVID: I've been using RingFit (a Video game on Nintendo Switch console) and home body weight workouts to keep in shape
Nutrition: I keep track of what I drink and eat and log it into MyFitnessPal to ensure I am always on the right track to my fitness goals

data.title: Videogames
bullets: Avid Gamer: I've been playing video games since I was in elementary school. My first console was the Nintendo 64.
Current Consoles I own: Nintendo Switch, PS4, PC
Favorite Games of 2020: Hades, Animal Crossing, The Last of Us 2, Final Fantasy 7 Remake
Favorite Game of all time: The Legend of Zelda - Ocarina of Time
